name: Atlantis Slots Casino - #1 Deluxe Adventure Spin by The Classic Wheel for Free
name_original: Atlantis Slots Casino - #1 Deluxe Adventure Spin by The Classic Wheel for Free
description:
Get ready to WIN BIG!! Do you love slots? Can't get enough?? Then get this awesome new Atlantis Slots Casino game! Deep below the oceans surface awaits a lost world full of treasure and mystique that is full of slot spinning action and fun. Some of the loosest slots on the app store!

Features:
+ Big money slots action right from the comfort of your home!
+ FREE starter coins
+ FREE DAILY BONUS to win BIG! You never have to pay for coins ever!
+ No Facebook required
+ Easy BONUS rounds to WIN more
+ Universal for iPhone & iPad, retina graphics
+ Game Center for leaderboards, AND MUCH MORE!

Download it now and PLAY for FREE! Don't forget to claim your FREE coins slot machine BONUS every day by opening the app!
